sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>compare</radical> radical and the <kanji>compare</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Huzzah!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Compare</kanji> the <reading>he</reading>at (<ja>ひ</ja>) today with the heat yesterday. Is it hotter today? It's up to you to compare.
readingInfo: Feel today's heat. Now compare it to yesterday. You might want to check your thermometer if you're not sure!
